title: Choosing your first device: pods vs. mods | Vapor Verse Blog
desc: New to vaping and staring at a wall of devices? Most first-time buyers end up choosing between pod systems and box mods (often just called “mods”).

title: Vaping 101: Terms, types, and basic etiquette | Vapor Verse Blog
desc: Adult-only note: Vaping products contain nicotine, which is addictive and not risk‑free. Follow local laws, keep devices and liquids away from children and pets
